siteTagline: A mystical journey to read destiny
heroDescription: Discover the mystical stories hidden in your palm. The moment when ancient wisdom meets modern technology.
uploadDescription: Take and upload a palm photo in good lighting so that clear palm lines are visible.
analyzingDesc: Ancient wisdom is interpreting your destiny
goodLightingDesc: Take photos in natural light or bright indoor lighting
clearFocusDesc: Focus so that palm lines are clearly visible
flatPositionDesc: Keep your palm flat when taking the photo
palmGuideDescription: Learn about the meanings of major palm lines
heartLineDesc: Represents emotions, love life, and heart health
heartLineTrait1: Starts under index: Satisfied love life
heartLineTrait2: Starts under middle: Selfish in love
headLine: Head Line
headLineDesc: Represents learning ability, intellectual activity, and thinking style
headLineTrait1: Short line: Prefers physical over mental achievements
lifeLineDesc: Represents physical health, vitality, and major life changes
lifeLineTrait1: Long and clear: Full of vitality
fateLineDesc: Represents external influences and life direction
fateLineTrait1: Clear line: Strongly influenced by fate
fateLineTrait2: Broken and changing: Major life changes
fortuneDescription: Your unique story told by ancient wisdom
shareText: I analyzed my palm reading on Palm Mystic! It's amazing
invalidFileTypeDesc: Only image files can be uploaded
footerDescription: Ancient wisdom meets modern technology to read your future from your palm. Get both fun and insight at the same time.
feedbackRequestPlaceholder: What features would you like to see added?
feedbackSuccess: Thank you! We'll consider your suggestion
westernDescription: Modern interpretation based on astrology and psychology
easternDescription: Traditional interpretation based on Yin-Yang and I-Ching
indianDescription: Spiritual interpretation based on Vedic astrology and karma
changeContext: Experience different interpretation methods from each culture
seoTitle: AI Palm Reading - Palm Mystic | Free Palmistry Fortune Telling
seoDescription: Get accurate palm reading analysis with AI technology. Free palmistry, love fortune, wealth fortune, and health fortune instantly. Fusion of traditional Eastern and Western palmistry with modern AI.
